articles.caption: A look at Legal & Regulatory consideratiosn for Web3 Gaming (Part2)
articles.title: Legal & Regulatory Considerations in Web3 Gaming (Part 2)  ‚Äî Naavik
articles.description:
Games are expensive to build. Gaming companies have traditionally raised 
money from publishers, crowdfunding platforms or by selling equity in the 
company to venture capitalists and angel investors. With crypto, there are 
two additional ways to raise money now: by selling game tokens and/or NFTs. 
In this essay, Amy Madison explores how web3 gaming companies have been 
redefining fundraising and securities laws with the introduction of NFTs 
and tokens.
